Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 119th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/21/2015, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,142,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 6/10/2016 (Going to BRO: P Marion Tobler, P Ryan Boston, P Dalton Tennison, P Bernard Coloma, 3B Fede Alfaro. Going to CIN: RF Jeffrey Corum, 3B John Losey,
CF Michael Turner)...
Injured on 6/19/2016 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/17/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $4,570,000 per year...
